sn35.145:1.2: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rupanam uppadaya, sopi anatta.
sn35.145:1.3: Anattasambhuta, bhikkhave, rupa kuto atta bhavissanti.
sn35.145:1.9: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo dhammanam uppadaya, sopi anatta.
sn35.145:1.10: Anattasambhuta, bhikkhave, dhamma kuto atta bhavissanti.
sn35.145:1.11: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupesupi nibbindati, saddesupi … gandhesupi … rasesupi … photthabbesupi … dhammesupi nibbindati.
sn35.145:1.12: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.145:1.13: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
